item.title: Automate Borg Backup
item.description: The previous post, Borg Backup, explained installation and basics of Borg, and this post introduces Pybs, a simple python script to automate backups in Linux systems. To automate the backups, Pybs uses Python, YAML, Borg and Systemd. For non-linux platforms use some other task scheduler in place of Systemd. Installation Download Pybs from Github and extract it in your home dir. Pybs, by default, uses Borg repository at $HOME/backup/borgrepo located in user home directory, and for sake of explanation, we stick with it.
